title: Man is in custody after his mother, stepfather and two brothers were shot dead
text:
Police say a man is in custody following the deaths of his mother, stepfather and two brothers, including a 6-year-old boy, who were found shot in a west Philadelphia home.

Officials said in a statement that officers were sent Wednesday afternoon to check on a couple who didn't show up for work and were 'known to have trouble with a mentally unstable son.'

Arriving officers found a 29-year-old man in a second-floor bedroom and took him into custody.

A grieving woman is assisted outside a home where four people were found shot dead Wednesday

Neighbors grieve near a home where the four people were found. A 29-year-old man in a second-floor bedroom and took him into custody

Philadelphia police stand outside the property in West Philadelphia

His 51-year-old mother was found shot by the front door and his stepfather was found by the basement door, while a 17-year-old brother was found shot in a second-floor bedroom and a 6-year-old brother was found shot in the kitchen.

All four victims were pronounced dead at the scene and a weapon was recovered.
description: Police say a man is in custody following the deaths of his mother, stepfather and two brothers, including a 6-year-old boy, who were found shot in a west Philadelphia home.
